original: 曹操滅袁氏、討烏桓，定北方，遂興南征之志，鑿玄武池操練水軍。建安十三年（208年）秋，曹軍下荊州，劉表病故，次子劉琮降曹。
text: Cao Cao destroys the Yuan family, discusses Wuhuan, sets the north, then inspires the ambition of the southern campaign, drills the Xuanwu pond to drill the navy. In the autumn of the 13th year of Jian'an (208), Cao Jun went to Jingzhou, Liu Biao died of illness, and his second son Liu Cong came to Cao.
